messages.message: anyone have a “combine these two merge ibocr’s IBOCRs” (same refiner columns) UDF?
that’d be a nice snippet helper. I think @Kerry or @Jonathan Shih might have one
I don’t think I understand the question. You have two out.ibocr’s from a merge step? or you just have two ibocr’s with the same columns? and what do you want to do with the columns?

I want to combine these two IBOCRs: https://www.instabase.com/apps/ocr/review-batch/MetLife2020/MetLife/fs/Metlife%20Drive/IB_pilot/workspace-chetan/templates/homecare/varun/new_data-chetan/out/s4_merge_files/out.ibocr
https://www.instabase.com/apps/ocr/review-batch/MetLife2020/MetLife/fs/Metlife%20Drive/IB_pilot/workspace-chetan/templates/homecare/varun/new_data/last_25_golden/out.ibocr

They have the same refiner columns with different data. I want to create one `out.ibocr` that has data from both of those.

@Jonathan Shih

@Chetan as in you want to basically have another merge files step except with an external file? I don’t have any existing UDFs for this, but it should be fairly straightforward. In a post-flow udf, you should just be able to load both files as a ParsedIBOCR and add the records from one to the other. Or am I getting your question completely wrong? haha
nah you’re getting it right. and yea just checking if it was written already if not i’ll go ahead and write it :slightly_smiling_face:
haha ah cool. Yeah, I’ve never done this, not sure if @Kerry has
